nycTheatreExcerpt: : "And those aren't the only flaws in this awkwardly paced, abruptly mood-shifting tale of two very different women on the verge of old age looking to outrun their pasts and stake new claims on the future. Not even the ever-reliable director Jack O'Brien can get a firm grasp on this squiggly story, but at least he doesn't have to make the effort alone: Who wouldn't want Farrow and LuPone on their team?"
